content: @Samuel Dubovec - as @Folkert de Vries mentioned, there are several potential options for a thesis project! Is there a particular area of language development you're interested in? Or no preference?

Hello, I have no specific preference for now, but if it is possible the check more fields and choose one than, that would be perfect. From these which @Folkert de Vries have mentioned, parsing or type checking sounds interesting to me. Or maybe if there is some work on core as for e. list module, that would be interesting to me as well.
Thanks.
